name: Nubs Nob
description: Nub’s Nob is where skiers go. Situated near Petoskey and Harbor Springs, and a short drive from I-75. This family-owned ski hill features 53 runs on 3 faces, 29 km of cross-country and snowshoe trails, 2 day lodges, 8 chairlifts, one beginner conveyor and one rope tow on 248 skiable acres.
